<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## repeat() function

지정된 값을 포함하는 크기 n의 Iterable/AsyncIterable을 반환합니다.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function repeat<T>(n: number, value: T): IterableIterator<T>;
```

## Example

```ts
const iter = repeat(2, 10);
iter.next(); // {value: 10, done:false}
iter.next(); // {value: 10, done:false}
iter.next(); // {value: undefined, done:true}

// with pipe
pipe(repeat(2, 10), toArray); // [10, 10]
```

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/Lazy/repeat.ts)
